name: omnipoly
description: OmniPoly is a self-hosted flashcard and spaced repetition tool with support for image and text content. It includes tagging, review scheduling, and a clean UI for personal study workflows.
features: Flashcard creation: Build study cards with text and images on both sides for versatile learning materials.
Spaced repetition: Review cards on an optimized schedule that adapts to your performance for better retention.
Tag organization: Categorize flashcards with multiple tags to create custom study sets and filter by topic.
Progress tracking: Monitor review statistics and success rates to identify areas needing more practice.
Image support: Add diagrams, photos, or illustrations to cards for visual learning and memory association.
Custom decks: Organize flashcards into separate decks by subject, course, or learning goal for structured study.
Review scheduling: See upcoming reviews and daily study goals based on the spaced repetition algorithm.
Self-hosted data: Keep all study materials and progress on your own server for privacy and offline access.
